TextBlock.Text: Lotus: Now this is really something! For real, this time!
Lotus: I'm still not sure where any actual life forms are, but whoever or whatever they are have managed to build some sort of <color=orange>tesseract</color>!
Lotus: I can change it back and forth between two states. But is that really all there is to it?
Lotus: ...And I'd better watch my step. It seems as though the gravity around the tesseract is unbelievably strong and could tear me apart. Or crush me. Or do other unpleasant things.
